t: Sing*pn a new song to the Lord,*s for*ln he has performed wonders; his*ln right hand and holy arm have*ln won him victory.
The*ln Lord*s has made his victory known; he*ln has revealed his righteousness in*ln the sight of the nations.
He*ln has remembered his love and*ln faithfulness to the house of Israel; all*ln the ends of the earth have*ln seen our God’s victory.
Let*pn the whole earth shout to the Lord;*s be*ln jubilant, shout for joy, and sing.
Sing*ln to the Lord*s with the lyre, with*ln the lyre and melodious song.
With*ln trumpets and the blast of the ram’s horn shout*ln triumphantly in*ln the presence of the Lord,*s our King.
Let*pn the sea and all that fills it, the*ln world and those who live in it, resound.
Let*ln the rivers clap their hands; let*ln the mountains shout together for joy
before*ln the Lord,*s for*ln he is coming to judge the earth. He*ln will judge the world righteously and*ln the peoples fairly.
